data.text:
Murata Manufacturing Co., Ltd was established in October 1944. The Number of Employees is 34,090 in consolidated basis and 6,916 in Parent Co. basis. In 1962, Murata exported first plant. Then Murata opened New York Office in the next year. Murata reorganized into a marketing company and established Murata Electronics Singapore Ltd. in Singapore. In 1973 Murata established a production company in Georgia, U.S. and a marketing company in Hong Kong, China. In Nov.

1975 Murata opened Europe Office. Murata acquired a production and marketing company (now Taiwan Murata Electronics Co., Ltd.) in Taiwan in 1978. In Dec. 1980, Murata Opened Seoul Branch in Seoul, Korea. Then it established a marketing company (now Murata Electronics (UK) Limited) in UK. In Apr. 1986, Murata established Murata Amaz?nia Indústria E Comércio Ltda., a production and marketing company in Brazil. In Jul. 1990, Murata established Murata World Comercial Ltda., a marketing company in Brazil. Then Murata established Murata Electronics (Malaysia) Sdn. Bhd., a production marketing company, Beijing Murata Electronics Co., Ltd., a production and marketing company, Wuxi Murata Electronics Co., Ltd., a production and marketing company, Murata Electronics Trading (Shanghai) Co., Ltd., a marketing company, in Shanghai. Murata established Design and Engineering Center in Murata (China) Investment Co., Ltd., Regional marketing Head Office and opened Representative Office of Murata Electronics Singapore (Pte.) Ltd. in 2007.

The Products of Murata include Monolithic Ceramic Capacitors, SAW Filters, Ceramic Resonators, Piezoelectric Sensors, Ceramic Filters, iezoelectric Buzzers, Short-range Wireless Communication Modules, Multilayer Ceramic Devices, Connectors, Isolators, Power Supplies, Circuit Modules, EMI Suppression Filters, Inductor (coils) and Sensors.

This Murata inspection procedure includes:

IDEA-ICE-3000 (72-point) visual inspection by (3) different quality inspectors.

Data sheet verification of all parts.

Acetone swab test on sample pieces.

Digital photos of all outgoing Murata parts.

Extensive views under our macro zoom (200x) microscope for quality detection.

We maintain a strict approved vendor list (AVL).

Jotrin Electronics Limited. is the one-stop-shop for all board-level electronic components, raw materials and tool requirements. we stock a wide variety of electronic components, including hard-to-find, obsolete and allocated parts, and a great selection of Murata components. Can't find what you're looking for? If you ever have any questions, concerns or requests, please contact us and we will happily work with you to find what you need!

As one of the top suppliers of Murata electronic components, Jotrin Electronics Limited. can help you find whatever it is you are looking for. we have one of the largest collections of electric components online, and work with a widespread network of dependable contacts, local sourcing, and O.E.M excess inventories to help you locate hard-to-find and factory new electric components. When you want only the best electronic components, choose Jotrin, a leading Murata components supplier.

Jotrin Electronics Limited. is dedicated to providing the very best experience tocustomers by offering only the highest quality Murata components and superior customer service. With over $10 million of available inventory available, the largest line card online, and all grades of parts available (including mil-spec, industrial grade, and commercial grade parts), Jotrin Electronics Limited. is legendary forgreat selection and fantastic prices. When you get Murata component parts through Jotrin Electronics Limited., you have the peace of mind that you are receiving the best electronic components at the most competitive prices.

MURATA is product portfolio consists of The Products of Murata include Monolithic Ceramic Capacitors, SAW Filters, Ceramic Resonators, Piezoelectric Sensors, Ceramic Filters, iezoelectric Buzzers, Short-range Wireless Communication Modules, Multilayer Ceramic Devices, Connectors, Isolators, Power Supplies, Circuit Modules, EMI Suppression Filters, Inductor (coils) and Sensors..
